Reviews.Content: Nice Hotel This is a very nice hotel, which had very good service. The breakfast buffet was also very nice. The rooms were clean, and well kept. I would defiitely reccommend this hotel.
Reviews.Author: wmaguffin

Reviews.Content: Nothing Special, but Nice This place is just an ordinary business hotel. It's not too far from downtown, but I would only recommend it for visitors with meetings in the economic zone.
Reviews.Author: expdabest
